query:
SELECT sc.supplier_id, s.company_name, s.offers_out_of_hours, sc.city, sc.country 
FROM coverage sc 
JOIN suppliers s ON s.id = sc.supplier_id 
WHERE sc.city = 'Mountain View' AND sc.country = 'US'
LIMIT 3
